name: TrashMail Contact Me
author: Sam Bull

sections.description:
Add a mailto link to your site so that every visitor gets a unique disposable
address, generated through the TrashMail service.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/trashmail-contact-me directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the [tm-contact] shortcode anywhere in your site to insert a mailto link.
  4. Alternatively, add a TrashMail menu item to your menu.
sections.faq:
.

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/trashmail-contact-me directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the [tm-contact] shortcode anywhere in your site to insert a mailto link.
  4. Alternatively, add a TrashMail menu item to your menu.
sections.changelog:
1.2

  • Add nofollow to contact link.

1.1

  • Now works when JavaScript is disabled.

1.0

  • Initial release.
